name: Neth
appearance: Lean, weather-browned, hooded oilskin that beads the rain, a wrecksilver tooth flashing when he laughs, and palms scarred by coral and chain.
character: Charming until the deal is struck, then as cold as the trench; keeps score without writing it down.
talents: vanishes into rib-sung surf like smoke
bribes exactly the right rung of the ladder
sings a rib-song that steadies panicking crews
flaws: sentiment for old wreckers blunts profit
seething hatred of Brinelaw blinds caution
dreams: Break the Compact’s choke on tariffs
Secure permanent safe coves under the bluffs
Leave a legacy that feeds wrecker widows for a generation
secrets: Keeps a ledger naming paid informants across the Market of Teeth
Arranged a ‘test’ slow-turn at the Array to prove a point about safety—then lost control of events
Sheltered a Compact heir after a drunken wreck rather than ransom them
